response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant discount compared to its market value. We trust that you will find this proposal attractive and look forward to your positive response. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. Thank you for considering this unique investment opportunity.", "product_price": 1200000}
